title: i GOT HACKED
body: PLEASE HELP SOMEONE HEACKED MY ACCOUNT please email me riot i need help and hes trying to sell my account he even changed my name

replies.body:
You will have to contact support directly and provide all the information you had from the creation date, IP you used when you joined, RP purchase history and transaction Ids. Then Riot will help you get your account back. 

If your account's email address is verified the hackers and future account owner will not be able to do much and you can always get your account back. 

I would suggest in future you use a completely different password for league, never log into any Web page that isn't Riot owned and has a security certificate. Nor should you share your account information with others.

Oh noooooeees! Hurry and reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and make sure to pick the option "I need help recovering my account". Once you verify yourself as the person who created this account, we'll be able to set everything right for you!
